front.title: Algorithms for Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) Protection of Symmetric Key Package Content Types
front.abstract: This document describes the conventions for using several cryptographic algorithms with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) to protect the symmetric key package content type. Specifically, it includes conventions necessary to implement SignedData, EnvelopedData, EncryptedData, and AuthEnvelopedData. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
